'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to cohorts including cohort identifier program of study preferred sequence of classes and quarters that a cohort will be taking specific classes.': Functional Suitability
'Only authorized users shall have access to the portion of the system that interfaces with CampusConnect.': Security
'Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.': Functional Suitability
'Washing parameters will be updated during scheduled maintenance hours.': Maintainability
'The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.': Reliability
'The estimator shall search for available recycled parts using a list of preferred parts suppliers.': Functional Suitability
'A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.': Usability
'Website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator.': Functional Suitability
'If the leads score falls within the low average then it will be returned to the supplying vendor': Functional Suitability
'A cohort shall be associated to one Program of Study offered by the department.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the percentage of available recycled parts used in the estimate ': Functional Suitability
'The product shall have the ability to receive automatic software updates as new threats emerge. 100% of customers will be able to receive automatic software updates transmitted to the installed product.': Security
'Aside from server failure the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.': Reliability
'Fit Criterion: Dr Susan Poslusny and Karen Sysol are the only people who shall have access to the final class section scheduling for the system that interfaces with CampusConnect.': Security
'The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.': Functional Suitability
'Only registered customers can purchase streaming movies.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall record the transportation status of equipment reserved.': Functional Suitability
'A new user shall be able to navigate through the league and team pages within 30 seconds of reaching the start-up page.': Usability
'The product shall have audit capabilities.The product shall store messages for a minimum of one year for audit and transaction tracking purposes.': Security
'Once a game is initiated the product shall display a defensive grid to each player': Functional Suitability
'The system shall allow a real estate agent to query MLS information': Functional Suitability
'System shall let the administrator add/remove categories on the website in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall be displayable on any work computer a CCR user may have. The system interface shall be formatted to display at 800 by 600 pixel resolution.': Usability
'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility
'The Disputes System must be accessible by both internal and external users.': Functional Suitability
'The product will be available for licensing as a one-server two-five servers or five-or-more servers license.': Compatibility
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Usability
'The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.': Performance Efficiency
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting classes including but not limited to class cancellations class section detail changes and changes to class offerings for a given quarter.': Functional Suitability
'Dr Susan Poslusny and Dr Julie Donalek are the only people who shall have access to students’ personal information.': Security
'The product shall use a standard navigation menu familiar to most web users.': Usability
'Once a game is initiated the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ships on their respective defensive grids.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall make inactive players unavailable for selection from the list of players.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall provide GUI based Monitoring Services.System Administrators shall monitor message exchanges will predict and determine problems and will also provide internal and external support.': Usability
'The product shall display each type of ship in a grid using an image of the specific type of ship.': Usability
'The Brio portion of the WCS system must be able to export files in spreadsheet form (Microsoft Excel and Lotus 1-2-3 formats). Brio will provide buttons in the user interface that produce/export reports in .xls or .123 file formats.': Compatibility
'Product formula ingredients shall allow defining substitutionary ingredients.': Functional Suitability
'The response shall be fast enough to avoid interrupting the user’s flow of thought. 90% of tasks shall complete within 5 seconds. 98% of tasks shall complete within 8 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'The message board shall contain the 5 most recently posted messages on the league page. The messages will contain up to the first 150 characters of the message.': Usability
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional Suitability
'The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.': Compatibility
'The System shall not require additional third party licenses resulting in royalty fees.': Compatibility
'The product shall store new conference rooms.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional Suitability
'For each turn the product shall allow the offensive player to define a shot.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. : 90% of new users shall be able to start the display of Events or Activities within 90 minutes of using the product.': Usability
'For each shot the product shall mark the shot as a hit or miss on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional Suitability
'One insurance company shall not be able to view another insurance companys claim data.': Security
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'Changes to revenue and expense formulae must be applied to the RFS system every year prior to the budgeting process start. Revenue and expense formulae will be updated within one week of their receipt after which 2 weeks will be allotted to testing of the budget calculations to be conducted jointly by the project development team and PCG Finance.': Maintainability
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “pay as you go” user in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.': Security
'The Disputes application shall support 350 concurrent users without any degradation of performance in the application.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall have basic data integrity checking to reduce the possibility of incorrect or invalid data being introduced.': Security
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. Nine out ten users shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training.': Usability
'The search radius shall be between 1 and 30 miles': Functional Suitability
'Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.': Reliability
'The website shall make its user aware of its information practices before collection data from them via a Privacy Policy accessible on all pages of the website.': Security
'100% of merchant services representatives shall be able to successfully perform a follow up action on a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.': Usability
'Students added to a cohort shall be eligible for the cohort’s Program of Study.': Functional Suitability
'The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game. The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Compatibility
'The display shall have two regions: left 2/3 of the display is graphical right 1/3 of the display is a data table': Functional Suitability
'98% of the user workstations shall meet the minimum software requirements prior to implementation: Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0. Microsoft .NET Framework 1.1. Microsoft Internet Explorer Web Controls': Compatibility
'The system shall allow a user to define the time segments': Functional Suitability
'The adjuster shall review the collision estimate.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System. This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant’s accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.': Compatibility
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Security
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional Suitability
'The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes System shall provide update access capability for authorized users of the application.': Functional Suitability
'A list of all disputes cases that meet the entered search criteria must be provided to the user. The list of cases must differentiate the type and/or status of the case by color -coding the line item in the list. For example all open cases will be yellow and all closed cases will be gray.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall interface with the faculty central server.': Compatibility
'Promotional updates to the website should take a day to update.': Maintainability
'The washing process must use a non binding neutral data format such as xml when receiving and processing lead data.': Compatibility
'All updates to data files or database must be initiated from the Disputes System.': Security
'Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'A primary database will be used to store cached data for active users.': Compatibility
'The product shall ensure that it can only be accessed by authorized users. The product will be able to distinguish between authorized and unauthorized users in all access attempts': Security
'The lead washing process will operate within the established physical web service structure.': Compatibility
'The product shall allow a user to identify himself or herself as a player.': Functional Suitability
'Movies can only be streamed if the customer has purchased a movie and is within the 2-day time period to stream the movie.': Functional Suitability
'System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the “My Account” section of the website.': Functional Suitability
'Data integrity scripts will be run on a weekly basis to verify the integrity of the database.': Security
'The application shall match the color of the schema set forth by Department of Homeland Security': Usability
'The Disputes System must provide the ability to view existing dispute cases.': Functional Suitability
'An employee will be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes. After informally navigating the product for less than 15 minutes users shall be able to successfully setup meetings and reserve conference rooms.': Usability
'The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be able to store new room equipment.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.': Maintainability
'System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.': Performance Efficiency
'The customer shall be able to easily integrate new building maps with the product throughout the product’s lifecycle. Integration of new maps with the product shall be possible with little to no support from product support staff.': Maintainability
'90% of untrained realtors shall be able to install the product on their device without printed instructions': Usability
The product shall ensure that only supervisors can advertise empty time slots.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.': Security
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be able to delete room equipment.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow a user to remove himself or herself from the list of players at any time.': Functional Suitability
'The leads washing functionality will return the lead data supplied to the vendor along with the reason of rejection.': Functional Suitability
'Pre-paid cards shall be distributed via email or via a printed paper card.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional Suitability

'Only the System Administrator shall be able to reset a revoked user logon account': Security

'Dr Susan Poslusny and Dr Julie Donalek are the only people who shall have access to students’ personal information.': Security
'The product shall use a standard navigation menu familiar to most web users.': Usability
'Once a game is initiated the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ships on their respective defensive grids.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall make inactive players unavailable for selection from the list of players.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall provide GUI based Monitoring Services.System Administrators shall monitor message exchanges will predict and determine problems and will also provide internal and external support.': Usability
'The product shall display each type of ship in a grid using an image of the specific type of ship.': Usability
'The Brio portion of the WCS system must be able to export files in spreadsheet form (Microsoft Excel and Lotus 1-2-3 formats). Brio will provide buttons in the user interface that produce/export reports in .xls or .123 file formats.': Compatibility
'Product formula ingredients shall allow defining substitutionary ingredients.': Functional Suitability
'The response shall be fast enough to avoid interrupting the user’s flow of thought. 90% of tasks shall complete within 5 seconds. 98% of tasks shall complete within 8 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'The message board shall contain the 5 most recently posted messages on the league page. The messages will contain up to the first 150 characters of the message.': Usability
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional Suitability
'The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.': Compatibility
'The System shall not require additional third party licenses resulting in royalty fees.': Compatibility
'The product shall store new conference rooms.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional Suitability
'For each turn the product shall allow the offensive player to define a shot.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. : 90% of new users shall be able to start the display of Events or Activities within 90 minutes of using the product.': Usability
'For each shot the product shall mark the shot as a hit or miss on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional Suitability
'One insurance company shall not be able to view another insurance companys claim data.': Security
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'Changes to revenue and expense formulae must be applied to the RFS system every year prior to the budgeting process start. Revenue and expense formulae will be updated within one week of their receipt after which 2 weeks will be allotted to testing of the budget calculations to be conducted jointly by the project development team and PCG Finance.': Maintainability
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “pay as you go” user in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.': Security
'The Disputes application shall support 350 concurrent users without any degradation of performance in the application.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall have basic data integrity checking to reduce the possibility of incorrect or invalid data being introduced.': Security
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. Nine out ten users shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training.': Usability
'The search radius shall be between 1 and 30 miles': Functional Suitability
'Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.': Reliability
'The website shall make its user aware of its information practices before collection data from them via a Privacy Policy accessible on all pages of the website.': Security
'100% of merchant services representatives shall be able to successfully perform a follow up action on a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.': Usability
'Students added to a cohort shall be eligible for the cohort’s Program of Study.': Functional Suitability
'The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game. The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Compatibility
'The display shall have two regions: left 2/3 of the display is graphical right 1/3 of the display is a data table': Functional Suitability
'98% of the user workstations shall meet the minimum software requirements prior to implementation: Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0. Microsoft .NET Framework 1.1. Microsoft Internet Explorer Web Controls': Compatibility
'The system shall allow a user to define the time segments': Functional Suitability
'The adjuster shall review the collision estimate.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System. This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant’s accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.': Compatibility
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Security
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional Suitability
'The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes System shall provide update access capability for authorized users of the application.': Functional Suitability
'A list of all disputes cases that meet the entered search criteria must be provided to the user. The list of cases must differentiate the type and/or status of the case by color -coding the line item in the list. For example all open cases will be yellow and all closed cases will be gray.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall interface with the faculty central server.': Compatibility
'Promotional updates to the website should take a day to update.': Maintainability
'The washing process must use a non binding neutral data format such as xml when receiving and processing lead data.': Compatibility
'All updates to data files or database must be initiated from the Disputes System.': Security
'Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'A primary database will be used to store cached data for active users.': Compatibility
'The product shall ensure that it can only be accessed by authorized users. The product will be able to distinguish between authorized and unauthorized users in all access attempts': Security
'The lead washing process will operate within the established physical web service structure.': Compatibility
'The product shall allow a user to identify himself or herself as a player.': Functional Suitability
'Movies can only be streamed if the customer has purchased a movie and is within the 2-day time period to stream the movie.': Functional Suitability
'System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the “My Account” section of the website.': Functional Suitability
'Data integrity scripts will be run on a weekly basis to verify the integrity of the database.': Security
'The application shall match the color of the schema set forth by Department of Homeland Security': Usability
'The Disputes System must provide the ability to view existing dispute cases.': Functional Suitability
'An employee will be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes. After informally navigating the product for less than 15 minutes users shall be able to successfully setup meetings and reserve conference rooms.': Usability
'The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be able to store new room equipment.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.': Maintainability
'System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.': Performance Efficiency
'The customer shall be able to easily integrate new building maps with the product throughout the product’s lifecycle. Integration of new maps with the product shall be possible with little to no support from product support staff.': Maintainability
'90% of untrained realtors shall be able to install the product on their device without printed instructions': Usability
The product shall ensure that only supervisors can advertise empty time slots.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.': Security
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be able to delete room equipment.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow a user to remove himself or herself from the list of players at any time.': Functional Suitability
'The leads washing functionality will return the lead data supplied to the vendor along with the reason of rejection.': Functional Suitability
'Pre-paid cards shall be distributed via email or via a printed paper card.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall record different meeting types.': Functional Suitability
'Only the System Administrator shall be able to reset a revoked user logon account': Security
'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.': Compatibility
'The estimator shall search by zipcode with a radius of 30 miles if no parts are found for the preferred parts suppliers': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be able to be installed in the specified environment within 1 working day.': Compatibility

'The system shall prevent malicious attacks including denial of service.': Security
'PME Subsystem shall allow for a product to exist in more than one submenu': Functional Suitability
'All of the users shall be able to use the system after one day of training.': Usability

'While streaming a movie buffering should only occur if there is latency in the user’s connection.': Performance Efficiency

'The Disputes application shall support 350 concurrent users without any degradation of performance in the application.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall have basic data integrity checking to reduce the possibility of incorrect or invalid data being introduced.': Security
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. Nine out ten users shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training.': Usability
'The search radius shall be between 1 and 30 miles': Functional Suitability
'Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.': Reliability
'The website shall make its user aware of its information practices before collection data from them via a Privacy Policy accessible on all pages of the website.': Security
'100% of merchant services representatives shall be able to successfully perform a follow up action on a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.': Usability
'Students added to a cohort shall be eligible for the cohort’s Program of Study.': Functional Suitability
'The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game. The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Compatibility
'The display shall have two regions: left 2/3 of the display is graphical right 1/3 of the display is a data table': Functional Suitability
'98% of the user workstations shall meet the minimum software requirements prior to implementation: Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0. Microsoft .NET Framework 1.1. Microsoft Internet Explorer Web Controls': Compatibility
'The system shall allow a user to define the time segments': Functional Suitability
'The adjuster shall review the collision estimate.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System. This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant’s accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.': Compatibility
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Security
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional Suitability
'The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes System shall provide update access capability for authorized users of the application.': Functional Suitability
'A list of all disputes cases that meet the entered search criteria must be provided to the user. The list of cases must differentiate the type and/or status of the case by color -coding the line item in the list. For example all open cases will be yellow and all closed cases will be gray.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall interface with the faculty central server.': Compatibility
'Promotional updates to the website should take a day to update.': Maintainability
'The washing process must use a non binding neutral data format such as xml when receiving and processing lead data.': Compatibility
'All updates to data files or database must be initiated from the Disputes System.': Security
'Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'A primary database will be used to store cached data for active users.': Compatibility
'The product shall ensure that it can only be accessed by authorized users. The product will be able to distinguish between authorized and unauthorized users in all access attempts': Security
'The lead washing process will operate within the established physical web service structure.': Compatibility
'The product shall allow a user to identify himself or herself as a player.': Functional Suitability
'Movies can only be streamed if the customer has purchased a movie and is within the 2-day time period to stream the movie.': Functional Suitability
'System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the “My Account” section of the website.': Functional Suitability
'Data integrity scripts will be run on a weekly basis to verify the integrity of the database.': Security
'The application shall match the color of the schema set forth by Department of Homeland Security': Usability
'The Disputes System must provide the ability to view existing dispute cases.': Functional Suitability
'An employee will be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes. After informally navigating the product for less than 15 minutes users shall be able to successfully setup meetings and reserve conference rooms.': Usability
'The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be able to store new room equipment.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.': Maintainability
'System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.': Performance Efficiency
'The customer shall be able to easily integrate new building maps with the product throughout the product’s lifecycle. Integration of new maps with the product shall be possible with little to no support from product support staff.': Maintainability
'90% of untrained realtors shall be able to install the product on their device without printed instructions': Usability
The product shall ensure that only supervisors can advertise empty time slots.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.': Security
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be able to delete room equipment.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow a user to remove himself or herself from the list of players at any time.': Functional Suitability
'The leads washing functionality will return the lead data supplied to the vendor along with the reason of rejection.': Functional Suitability
'Pre-paid cards shall be distributed via email or via a printed paper card.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall record different meeting types.': Functional Suitability
'Only the System Administrator shall be able to reset a revoked user logon account': Security
'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.': Compatibility
'The estimator shall search by zipcode with a radius of 30 miles if no parts are found for the preferred parts suppliers': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be able to be installed in the specified environment within 1 working day.': Compatibility
'The adjuster shall be able to override the preferred repair facitlity on the estimate assignment.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall prevent malicious attacks including denial of service.': Security
'PME Subsystem shall allow for a product to exist in more than one submenu': Functional Suitability
'All of the users shall be able to use the system after one day of training.': Usability
'The product shall record updated meeting agendas.': Functional Suitability
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Usability
'While streaming a movie buffering should only occur if there is latency in the user’s connection.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall increase productivity of Collision Estimators. 80% of the Collision Estimators shall agree their productivity has increase within 1 month of using the product.': Usability
'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be easy to learn by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. The product shall be learned with two days onsite training': Usability
'The product shall have security.The product shall provide authentication and authorization.': Security
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Performance Efficiency
'System shall let Izogn Manager access sales and usage statistics in under 2 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to cohorts including cohort identifier program of study preferred sequence of classes and quarters that a cohort will be taking specific classes.': Functional Suitability
'Only authorized users shall have access to the portion of the system that interfaces with CampusConnect.': Security
'Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.': Functional Suitability
'Washing parameters will be updated during scheduled maintenance hours.': Maintainability
'The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.': Reliability
'The estimator shall search for available recycled parts using a list of preferred parts suppliers.': Functional Suitability
'A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.': Usability
'Website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator.': Functional Suitability
'If the leads score falls within the low average then it will be returned to the supplying vendor': Functional Suitability
'A cohort shall be associated to one Program of Study offered by the department.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the percentage of available recycled parts used in the estimate ': Functional Suitability
'The product shall have the ability to receive automatic software updates as new threats emerge. 100% of customers will be able to receive automatic software updates transmitted to the installed product.': Security
'Aside from server failure the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.': Reliability

'Only registered customers can purchase streaming movies.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall record the transportation status of equipment reserved.': Functional Suitability
'A new user shall be able to navigate through the league and team pages within 30 seconds of reaching the start-up page.': Usability
'The product shall have audit capabilities.The product shall store messages for a minimum of one year for audit and transaction tracking purposes.': Security
'Once a game is initiated the product shall display a defensive grid to each player': Functional Suitability
'The system shall allow a real estate agent to query MLS information': Functional Suitability
'System shall let the administrator add/remove categories on the website in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall be displayable on any work computer a CCR user may have. The system interface shall be formatted to display at 800 by 600 pixel resolution.': Usability
'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility
'The Disputes System must be accessible by both internal and external users.': Functional Suitability
'The product will be available for licensing as a one-server two-five servers or five-or-more servers license.': Compatibility
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Usability
'The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.': Performance Efficiency
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting classes including but not limited to class cancellations class section detail changes and changes to class offerings for a given quarter.': Functional Suitability

'Once a game is initiated the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ships on their respective defensive grids.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall make inactive players unavailable for selection from the list of players.': Functional Suitability

'For each turn the product shall allow the offensive player to define a shot.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. : 90% of new users shall be able to start the display of Events or Activities within 90 minutes of using the product.': Usability
'For each shot the product shall mark the shot as a hit or miss on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional Suitability
'One insurance company shall not be able to view another insurance companys claim data.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall be capable of processing 100% of nursing students and their classes for the next 10 years.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'A primary database will be used to store cached data for active users.': Compatibility
'The product shall ensure that it can only be accessed by authorized users. The product will be able to distinguish between authorized and unauthorized users in all access attempts': Security
'The lead washing process will operate within the established physical web service structure.': Compatibility
'The product shall allow a user to identify himself or herself as a player.': Functional Suitability
'Movies can only be streamed if the customer has purchased a movie and is within the 2-day time period to stream the movie.': Functional Suitability
'System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the “My Account” section of the website.': Functional Suitability
'Data integrity scripts will be run on a weekly basis to verify the integrity of the database.': Security
'The application shall match the color of the schema set forth by Department of Homeland Security': Usability
'The Disputes System must provide the ability to view existing dispute cases.': Functional Suitability
'An employee will be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes. After informally navigating the product for less than 15 minutes users shall be able to successfully setup meetings and reserve conference rooms.': Usability
'The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be able to store new room equipment.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.': Maintainability
'System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.': Performance Efficiency
'The customer shall be able to easily integrate new building maps with the product throughout the product’s lifecycle. Integration of new maps with the product shall be possible with little to no support from product support staff.': Maintainability
'90% of untrained realtors shall be able to install the product on their device without printed instructions': Usability
The product shall ensure that only supervisors can advertise empty time slots.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.': Security
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be able to delete room equipment.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow a user to remove himself or herself from the list of players at any time.': Functional Suitability
'The leads washing functionality will return the lead data supplied to the vendor along with the reason of rejection.': Functional Suitability
'Pre-paid cards shall be distributed via email or via a printed paper card.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall record different meeting types.': Functional Suitability
'Only the System Administrator shall be able to reset a revoked user logon account': Security

'While streaming a movie buffering should only occur if there is latency in the user’s connection.': Performance Efficiency

'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional Suitability

'The product shall have security.The product shall provide authentication and authorization.': Security

'Washing parameters will be updated during scheduled maintenance hours.': Maintainability
'The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.': Reliability

'The system shall allow a real estate agent to query MLS information': Functional Suitability

'The product will be available for licensing as a one-server two-five servers or five-or-more servers license.': Compatibility

'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting classes including but not limited to class cancellations class section detail changes and changes to class offerings for a given quarter.': Functional Suitability

'Once a game is initiated the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ships on their respective defensive grids.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall make inactive players unavailable for selection from the list of players.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability

'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional Suitability
'The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.': Compatibility
'The System shall not require additional third party licenses resulting in royalty fees.': Compatibility
'The product shall store new conference rooms.': Functional Suitability

'For each turn the product shall allow the offensive player to define a shot.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. : 90% of new users shall be able to start the display of Events or Activities within 90 minutes of using the product.': Usability
'For each shot the product shall mark the shot as a hit or miss on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional Suitability
'One insurance company shall not be able to view another insurance companys claim data.': Security
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'Changes to revenue and expense formulae must be applied to the RFS system every year prior to the budgeting process start. Revenue and expense formulae will be updated within one week of their receipt after which 2 weeks will be allotted to testing of the budget calculations to be conducted jointly by the project development team and PCG Finance.': Maintainability
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “pay as you go” user in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.': Security
'The Disputes application shall support 350 concurrent users without any degradation of performance in the application.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall have basic data integrity checking to reduce the possibility of incorrect or invalid data being introduced.': Security
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. Nine out ten users shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training.': Usability
'The search radius shall be between 1 and 30 miles': Functional Suitability
'Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.': Reliability
'The website shall make its user aware of its information practices before collection data from them via a Privacy Policy accessible on all pages of the website.': Security
'100% of merchant services representatives shall be able to successfully perform a follow up action on a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.': Usability
'Students added to a cohort shall be eligible for the cohort’s Program of Study.': Functional Suitability
'The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game. The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.': Performance Efficiency

'The display shall have two regions: left 2/3 of the display is graphical right 1/3 of the display is a data table': Functional Suitability

'The system shall allow a user to define the time segments': Functional Suitability

'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Security
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional Suitability
'The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes System shall provide update access capability for authorized users of the application.': Functional Suitability

'Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'A user shall be able to use the system without instruction after a short amount of time. After one use a user should understand and remember 90% of the system usage and navigation.'

The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall record different meeting types.': Functional Suitability
'Only the System Administrator shall be able to reset a revoked user logon account': Security
'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.': Compatibility
'The estimator shall search by zipcode with a radius of 30 miles if no parts are found for the preferred parts suppliers': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be able to be installed in the specified environment within 1 working day.': Compatibility
'The adjuster shall be able to override the preferred repair facitlity on the estimate assignment.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall prevent malicious attacks including denial of service.': Security
'PME Subsystem shall allow for a product to exist in more than one submenu': Functional Suitability
'All of the users shall be able to use the system after one day of training.': Usability
'The product shall record updated meeting agendas.': Functional Suitability
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Usability
'While streaming a movie buffering should only occur if there is latency in the user’s connection.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall increase productivity of Collision Estimators. 80% of the Collision Estimators shall agree their productivity has increase within 1 month of using the product.': Usability
'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be easy to learn by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. The product shall be learned with two days onsite training': Usability
'The product shall have security.The product shall provide authentication and authorization.': Security
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Performance Efficiency
'System shall let Izogn Manager access sales and usage statistics in under 2 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to cohorts including cohort identifier program of study preferred sequence of classes and quarters that a cohort will be taking specific classes.': Functional Suitability
'Only authorized users shall have access to the portion of the system that interfaces with CampusConnect.': Security
'Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.': Functional Suitability
'Washing parameters will be updated during scheduled maintenance hours.': Maintainability
'The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.': Reliability
'The estimator shall search for available recycled parts using a list of preferred parts suppliers.': Functional Suitability
'A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.': Usability
'Website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator.': Functional Suitability
'If the leads score falls within the low average then it will be returned to the supplying vendor': Functional Suitability
'A cohort shall be associated to one Program of Study offered by the department.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the percentage of available recycled parts used in the estimate ': Functional Suitability
'The product shall have the ability to receive automatic software updates as new threats emerge. 100% of customers will be able to receive automatic software updates transmitted to the installed product.': Security
'Aside from server failure the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.': Reliability
'Fit Criterion: Dr Susan Poslusny and Karen Sysol are the only people who shall have access to the final class section scheduling for the system that interfaces with CampusConnect.': Security
'The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.': Functional Suitability
'Only registered customers can purchase streaming movies.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall record the transportation status of equipment reserved.': Functional Suitability
'A new user shall be able to navigate through the league and team pages within 30 seconds of reaching the start-up page.': Usability
'The product shall have audit capabilities.The product shall store messages for a minimum of one year for audit and transaction tracking purposes.': Security
'Once a game is initiated the product shall display a defensive grid to each player': Functional Suitability
'The system shall allow a real estate agent to query MLS information': Functional Suitability
'System shall let the administrator add/remove categories on the website in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall be displayable on any work computer a CCR user may have. The system interface shall be formatted to display at 800 by 600 pixel resolution.': Usability
'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility
'The Disputes System must be accessible by both internal and external users.': Functional Suitability
'The product will be available for licensing as a one-server two-five servers or five-or-more servers license.': Compatibility
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Usability
'The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.': Performance Efficiency
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting classes including but not limited to class cancellations class section detail changes and changes to class offerings for a given quarter.': Functional Suitability
'Dr Susan Poslusny and Dr Julie Donalek are the only people who shall have access to students’ personal information.': Security
'The product shall use a standard navigation menu familiar to most web users.': Usability
'Once a game is initiated the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ships on their respective defensive grids.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall make inactive players unavailable for selection from the list of players.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall provide GUI based Monitoring Services.System Administrators shall monitor message exchanges will predict and determine problems and will also provide internal and external support.': Usability
'The product shall display each type of ship in a grid using an image of the specific type of ship.': Usability
'The Brio portion of the WCS system must be able to export files in spreadsheet form (Microsoft Excel and Lotus 1-2-3 formats). Brio will provide buttons in the user interface that produce/export reports in .xls or .123 file formats.': Compatibility
'Product formula ingredients shall allow defining substitutionary ingredients.': Functional Suitability
'The response shall be fast enough to avoid interrupting the user’s flow of thought. 90% of tasks shall complete within 5 seconds. 98% of tasks shall complete within 8 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'The message board shall contain the 5 most recently posted messages on the league page. The messages will contain up to the first 150 characters of the message.': Usability
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional Suitability
'The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.': Compatibility
'The System shall not require additional third party licenses resulting in royalty fees.': Compatibility
'The product shall store new conference rooms.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional Suitability
'For each turn the product shall allow the offensive player to define a shot.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. : 90% of new users shall be able to start the display of Events or Activities within 90 minutes of using the product.': Usability
'For each shot the product shall mark the shot as a hit or miss on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional Suitability
'One insurance company shall not be able to view another insurance companys claim data.': Security
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'Changes to revenue and expense formulae must be applied to the RFS system every year prior to the budgeting process start. Revenue and expense formulae will be updated within one week of their receipt after which 2 weeks will be allotted to testing of the budget calculations to be conducted jointly by the project development team and PCG Finance.': Maintainability
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “pay as you go” user in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.': Security
'The Disputes application shall support 350 concurrent users without any degradation of performance in the application.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall have basic data integrity checking to reduce the possibility of incorrect or invalid data being introduced.': Security
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. Nine out ten users shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training.': Usability
'The search radius shall be between 1 and 30 miles': Functional Suitability
'Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.': Reliability
'The website shall make its user aware of its information practices before collection data from them via a Privacy Policy accessible on all pages of the website.': Security
'100% of merchant services representatives shall be able to successfully perform a follow up action on a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.': Usability
'Students added to a cohort shall be eligible for the cohort’s Program of Study.': Functional Suitability
'The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game. The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Compatibility
'The display shall have two regions: left 2/3 of the display is graphical right 1/3 of the display is a data table': Functional Suitability
'98% of the user workstations shall meet the minimum software requirements prior to implementation: Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0. Microsoft .NET Framework 1.1. Microsoft Internet Explorer Web Controls': Compatibility
'The system shall allow a user to define the time segments': Functional Suitability
'The adjuster shall review the collision estimate.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System. This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant’s accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.': Compatibility
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Security
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional Suitability
'The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes System shall provide update access capability for authorized users of the application.': Functional Suitability
'A list of all disputes cases that meet the entered search criteria must be provided to the user. The list of cases must differentiate the type and/or status of the case by color -coding the line item in the list. For example all open cases will be yellow and all closed cases will be gray.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall interface with the faculty central server.': Compatibility
'Promotional updates to the website should take a day to update.': Maintainability
'The washing process must use a non binding neutral data format such as xml when receiving and processing lead data.': Compatibility
'All updates to data files or database must be initiated from the Disputes System.': Security
'Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Any disputes cases that have been closed for over 6 months must be purged from the online disputes database.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'A primary database will be used to store cached data for active users.': Compatibility
'The product shall ensure that it can only be accessed by authorized users. The product will be able to distinguish between authorized and unauthorized users in all access attempts': Security
'The lead washing process will operate within the established physical web service structure.': Compatibility
'The product shall allow a user to identify himself or herself as a player.': Functional Suitability
'Movies can only be streamed if the customer has purchased a movie and is within the 2-day time period to stream the movie.': Functional Suitability
'System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the “My Account” section of the website.': Functional Suitability
'Data integrity scripts will be run on a weekly basis to verify the integrity of the database.': Security
'The application shall match the color of the schema set forth by Department of Homeland Security': Usability
'The Disputes System must provide the ability to view existing dispute cases.': Functional Suitability
'An employee will be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes. After informally navigating the product for less than 15 minutes users shall be able to successfully setup meetings and reserve conference rooms.': Usability
'The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be able to store new room equipment.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.': Maintainability
'System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.': Performance Efficiency
'The customer shall be able to easily integrate new building maps with the product throughout the product’s lifecycle. Integration of new maps with the product shall be possible with little to no support from product support staff.': Maintainability
'90% of untrained realtors shall be able to install the product on their device without printed instructions': Usability
The product shall ensure that only supervisors can advertise empty time slots.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.': Security
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be able to delete room equipment.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow a user to remove himself or herself from the list of players at any time.': Functional Suitability
'The leads washing functionality will return the lead data supplied to the vendor along with the reason of rejection.': Functional Suitability
'Pre-paid cards shall be distributed via email or via a printed paper card.': Functional Suitability
